sentences.english: Shandong is the birthplace of many famous ancient scholars such as Confucious and Mencius.
sentences.chinese: 山東是許多著名學者的故鄉，例如孔夫子和孟子。

sentences.english: The I Ching was fully explained by Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子對易經做了詳細的解釋。

sentences.english: I guess that's probably the sort of "do whatever you like"supported by Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 我想，這大概就是孔夫子所說的“不逾矩”吧。

sentences.english: The revival of Confucius has been going on for years.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子的迴歸已經持續數年之久。

sentences.english: To me, that is what Confucius defines as “not overstepping the bounds”.
sentences.chinese: 我想，這大概就是孔夫子所說的“不逾矩”吧。

sentences.english: Confucius said quote is not all parents boon, me ashamed and embarrassed for.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子說報不盡是父母恩，我無地自容而且爲之汗顏。
這些學校叫做孔夫子書院。

sentences.english: Whether Confucius will have a solo show in the Shanghai museum remains to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 是否在上海科技館舉行一場孔夫子的個展還有待觀察。

sentences.english: In fact, Confucius explicitly stated that he would not talk about gods or ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，孔夫子明確表示不談怪力亂神。

sentences.english: Confucius also continues to be a godlike figure revered in temples from Korea to Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，從韓國到越南，孔夫子一直被當作神像來崇拜。

sentences.english: For many years he travelled from state to state, teaching the principles of Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 他常年周遊列國，遊說孔夫子的主張。
